# Product API reference

ExpandOn this page- [GET /{locale}/products/{product-handle}.js](/docs/api/ajax/reference/product#get--locale-products-product-handlejs)- [Response](/docs/api/ajax/reference/product#response)

# Product API referenceAsk assistantYou can make a `GET` request for the information of any product using the Ajax Product API.All Ajax API requests should use [locale-aware URLs](/docs/api/ajax#locale-aware-urls) to give visitors a consistent experience.

## [Anchor to GET /{locale}/products/{product-handle}.js](/docs/api/ajax/reference/product#get--locale-products-product-handlejs)GET /{locale}/products/{product-handle}.jsGet the JSON of a product using the product [handle](/docs/api/liquid/basics/handle).All monetary properties are returned in the customer's presentment currency. To check the customer's presentment currency, you can use the `currency` field of the `/{locale}/cart.js` endpoint. To learn more about selling in multiple currencies, see [Support multiple currencies and languages](/docs/storefronts/themes/markets/multiple-currencies-languages).### [Anchor to Example](/docs/api/ajax/reference/product#example)ExampleCopy9123fetch(window.Shopify.routes.root + 'products/red-rain-coat.js').then(response => response.json()).then(product => alert('The title of this product is ' + product.title));
